title: ionet
text: goal ionet develop network functionalities specialized data generated input-output tables.

title: ionet
text: can install development version ionet GitHub :

title: ionet
text: btw(): betweenness centrality measure incorporates available node-specific auxiliary information based strongest path. data_WIOD(): get data World Input-Output Database (WIOD). dijkstra(): implementation Dijkstra’s algorithm find shortest paths source node nodes given network.

title: ionet
text: Xiao, S., Yan, J. Zhang, P. (2022). Incorporating auxiliary information betweenness measure input-output networks. Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications, 607, 128200.

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: Compute betweenness centrality prior information based strongest path (SP).

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
Betweenness centrality — btw
text: adjmat matrix intermediate transactions input-output table, n--n matrix. gross gross input/output, n--1 vector. prior node-specific prior information, n--1 vector. alpha tuning parameter controlling weights SP strength prior information. default setting 1. type type SP calculate: "consumption"/"pull" (default) "distribution"/"push".

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: Lists betweeness score, associated SPs, SP distance SP strength.

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: Xiao, S., Yan, J. Zhang, P. (2022). "Incorporating Auxiliary Information Betweenness Measure Input-Output Networks". Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications, 607, 128200.

what: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: Download WIOD data ionet_ext, (extension repository storing data R package ionet), store package directory, load R workspace. data already downloaded, message displayed. data downloaded incomplete, error message displayed.

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
code: data_WIOD(version = c("2013 release", "2016 release", "long run"), year)

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: World Input-Output Database

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: version specific version WIOD, either "2013 release", "2016 release", "long run". year specific year data.

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: world input-output table WIOD specific version specific year.

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: size data may exceed capacity internet connection, potentially limiting download speed. World input-output tables WIOD 2013 Release period 1995 2011, covering 41 economies (27 EU economies, 13 major economies, Rest World), 35 sectors. format table data frame 1443 rows 1646 columns. Data calculated current prices. Values denoted millions US dollars (USD). World input-output tables WIOD 2016 Release period 2000 2014, covering 44 economies (28 EU economies, 15 major economies, Rest World), 56 sectors. format table data frame 2472 rows 2690 columns. Data calculated current prices. Values denoted millions US dollars (USD). World input-output tables Long-run WIOD period 1965 2000, covering 26 economies (25 economies, Rest World), 23 sectors. format table data frame 606 rows 710 columns. Data calculated current prices. Values denoted millions US dollars (USD).

title: Get data from the World Input-Output Database (WIOD) — data_WIOD
text: Dietzenbacher, E., Los, B., Stehrer R., Timmer, M. P. de Vries, G. J. (2013). "Construction World Input-Output Tables WIOD Project". Economic Systems Research, 25(1), 71--98. Timmer, M. P., Dietzenbacher, E., Los, B., Stehrer, R. de Vries, G. J. (2015). "Illustrated User Guide World Input-Output Database: Case Global Automotive Production". Review International Economics, 23(3), 575--605. Timmer, M. P., Los, B., Stehrer, R. de Vries, G. J. (2016). "Anatomy Global Trade Slowdown based WIOD 2016 Release". GGDC Research Memorandum 162, University Groningen. Woltjer, P., Gouma, R. Timmer, M. P. (2021). "Long-run World Input-Output Database: Version 1.1 Sources Methods". GGDC Research Memorandum 190, University Groningen.

title: Dijkstra's algorithm — dijkstra
text: Implement Dijkstra's algorithm find shortest paths source node nodes given network.

title: Dijkstra's algorithm — dijkstra
Dijkstra's algorithm — dijkstra
text: adjmat adjacency matrix directed weighted network. src given source node find shortest distance.

title: Dijkstra's algorithm — dijkstra
text: Lists distance, previous node.

title: Dijkstra's algorithm — dijkstra
text: Dijkstra, E. W. (1959). "Note Two Problems Connexion Graphs". Numerische Mathematik, 1, 269--271.
